name: Thai Vegetables Stir-Fry (Pad Pak Ruam Mit)
description: This easy recipe for Thai-style vegetable stir-fry can be customized with your choice of vegetables and heat level.
recipeIngredient: 1/8 cup water (optional, for a thinner sauce)
1/3 cup green onions (optional, chopped, for garnishing)

recipeInstructions.text: Ensure all your veggies are cut into even-sized pieces. This ensures everything cooks evenly and makes your stir-fry look better.
recipeInstructions.name: Ensure all your veggies are cut into even-sized pieces. This ensures everything cooks evenly and makes your stir-fry look better.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat your wok or skillet over high heat and add oil. Toss in the garlic and sauté until golden, about 20 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat your wok or skillet over high heat and add oil. Toss in the garlic and sauté until golden, about 20 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add your firmer vegetables like carrots, cucumber, onion, cauliflower, and Chinese broccoli to the wok. Give them a good stir-fry for about 3–4 minutes. I like to soften them slightly but still retain a crunch.
recipeInstructions.name: Add your firmer vegetables like carrots, cucumber, onion, cauliflower, and Chinese broccoli to the wok. Give them a good stir-fry for about 3–4 minutes. I like to soften them slightly but still retain a crunch.

recipeInstructions.text: Add white sugar, light soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Follow with the rest of your vegetables. For a saucy stir-fry, add a splash of water (about 1/8 cup). Continue to cook everything for another 2–3 minutes, until all veggies are evenly coated in the stir-fry sauce and cooked to your liking.
recipeInstructions.name: Add white sugar, light soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Follow with the rest of your vegetables. For a saucy stir-fry, add a splash of water (about 1/8 cup). Continue to cook everything for another 2–3 minutes, until all veggies are evenly coated in the stir-fry sauce and cooked to your liking.

keywords: pad pak ruam mit, pad thai vegetables, thai vegetables stir-fry
